body:
Hello and welcome to the @MrCodeInc Blog! I blog about **code and stuff.**

# Hello World?

so this my first post here telling you that on my github page you can view the **full** source code for my website. **K Bye.**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
